value.title: Install and configure Power BI Report Server (May 2017 Preview)
value.excerpt: In this video, I look at how to install and configure the May 2017 Preview of Power BI Report Server. Power BI Report Server has a new standalone install experience and this product allows for Power BI reports to be rendered in the web portal along with paginated reports. value.title: No Calendar Table? How to add Fiscal Month and Sort in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Thinking you don't need a date table in Power BI? What about Fiscal month? Patrick shows how you could potentially go about adding that without a full date table.  But really, use a central date table 😎  Do you need a date table for time intelligence in Power BI? Nope! (Quick Measures) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2f7dYB1l84g

value.title: Power BI: Build a custom KPI scorecard
value.excerpt: Patrick walks you through how you can use Power BI to build a custom KPI scorecard. The key is the UNICHAR DAX function. value.title: Power BI Reports and Buttons (new with Power BI Desktop - April 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at Power BI reports and buttons. Buttons were added to Power BI Desktop in the April 2018 release. You can now add buttons to your Power BI reports and configure actions for when they are selected.  Bookmarks and selections are a powerful combination with Power BI reports

value.title: Power BI Tutorial | From Flat File To Data Model
value.excerpt: In this Power BI Tutorial, Patrick looks at how to load data from a flat file to the data model. This could be a text, csv or excel file with a lot of columns. Don't just pull it into Power BI. Take time to structure your data in your data model. From flat file to data model is basic concept, but is

value.title: Power BI Tutorial: Sort By A Measure Not Shown In Visual
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Patrick shows you how you can sort by a measure not show in a visual within Power BI Desktop. This was something we didn't even know about until recently and it a great little Power BI nugget. If you wanted to sort by something not shown in a visual, this video is for you!

value.title: Combine Multiple or All Sheets from an Excel File into a Power BI solution Using Power Query Dynamic
value.excerpt: Combining multiple files from one folder is already supported built-in through the graphical interface of Power Query when use you Get Data from Folder. However, if you have one Excel file, with multiple sheets with the same structure but different data, you cannot use that option. There is a very little

value.title: Power BI From and To Date Filtering with One Slicer
value.excerpt: It happens that you might have two fields as From and To date (or Start and End date) in your dataset, and you want a date slicer in the report. The date slicer has to filter records in a way that the FROM and the TO dates are in the range of dates selected in the slicer. There are multiple ways of doing

value.title: Computing totals by summing visible values in DAX

value.title: Creating real time dashboards in Power BI with push datasets
value.excerpt: Though you can build real-time reports with DirectQuery, push datasets offer a more scalable, economical, and effective solution especially when combined with an Import model already in place. This video introduces the architecture of push datasets. Article and download: https://www.sqlbi.com/?p=729917&aff=yt
